name: Hentai Memory
description: Open the image by solving the puzzle under relaxing music. And also unlock 3000 achievements!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD A6 2.4Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD A6 2.4Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
